hero.title: Challenges That Need You!
hero.description: Choose one of the challenges below, or create your own custom challenge on the left.

form.titlePlaceholder: Bridging the Wealth Gap: Fighting Inequality

alerts.uploadError: Error occurred while uploading file. Please try again.
alerts.missingFields: Please fill in all required fields before adding the challenge.

steps.intro:
Welcome to the NewWorld Game!
My role, as your colleague—your problem-solving partner—is to help us develop a solution to a global problem on which you choose to work. Let’s start.
steps.focusArea: What is the NewWorld Game Solution General Focus Area?
steps.projectTitle: Provide a starting title to your project. You can change it later as your work progresses.
steps.problemDescription: In a few words, how would you describe the specific problem you're focusing on?
steps.teamMembers: List the members of your teams. Add their emails below. (This enables communication between team members and, as per NWG Privacy Policy, their information will remain private.)
steps.evaluators: Add below NWG members that you want to be reviewers/evaluators of your team’s work. (The names you supply will be supplemented by others chosen at random from other NWG members.)
steps.sdgs: Select any Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) that are related to your chosen problem area.
steps.submit: Almost done! Submit to start solving your new solution.

media.stepImageAlt: Illustration for the current creation step

validation.invalidEmails: Make sure all emails are valid.

alerts.unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file type. Use PNG, JPEG, or WebP.
alerts.fileTooLarge: The picture is too big. It should be less than 10MB.
alerts.uploadError: Error occurred while uploading file. Please try again.
